sentences.en: China's new - class of capitalists seized marquee event, hawking nosebleed tickets for astronomical prices.
sentences.cn: 中国 “ 新型资本家”抓住盛事的有利时机以“天价”贩卖超级紧俏的门票.

sentences.en: He is one of the marquee names in men's tennis.
sentences.cn: 他是男子网坛大名鼎鼎的人物之一。

sentences.en: Inside the vast marquee - cum - classroom, chalkboard instructed: " The disaster is merciless, but human beings have love. "
sentences.cn: 在宽大的帐篷兼教室里, 一块黑板上写着: “ 灾难无情, 人有情. ”

sentences.en: Strawberries and cream are in the marquee.
sentences.cn: 大帐篷内有草莓和奶油.

sentences.en: The marquee tag is a cool feature, but many overuse it.
sentences.cn: marquee标签确实有许多作用, 但我们不能过多使用.

sentences.en: The NBA's marquee matchup , once again on Christmas Day, will be the Kobe versus Shaq show.
sentences.cn: NBA吸引眼球的对战依旧会在圣诞节上演, 而又会是科比和奥尼尔之间的表演赛.

sentences.en: The twenty - seventh is my birthday, I plan to put up a marquee and throw a party.
sentences.cn: 二十七是我的生日, 我还要搭个棚呢,请请客.

sentences.en: The villagers put up a decorated marquee to celebrate the Spring festival.
sentences.cn: 为了庆祝春节,村子里搭起了彩棚.

sentences.en: Toggles between showing or hiding the marquee.
sentences.cn: 之间切换显示或隐藏了帐篷.

sentences.en: You can see the new improvements to Marquee and Multi - selection in the new Strategy Mode.
sentences.cn: 你可以在新的策略模式中看到对选取框以及多项选择的改进.

sentences.en: You'll have to hurry, the men will be coming today to put up the marquee. "
sentences.cn: 得赶紧扫, 今天搭棚的就来. ”

trans.tran_cn: 最重要的；最受欢迎的；杰出的
大帐篷，大天幕，选取框，门罩
